articles.title: Virtual Threads in the Real World: Fast, Robust Java Microservices with Helidon
articles.description: In 2022, our project made a significant decision: re-write our Netty-based Helidon Web Server to be fully implemented using virtual threads. The result is Helidon 4: the first microservices framework designed from the ground up for virtual threads. We are thrilled with the results, and have learned a few things along the way. Come join us as we introduce you to the benefits of virtual threads, share our lessons learned, give a few tips-and-tricks, and highlight what to look forward to in Java 24
